channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Honor claims its Robot Phone will launch later this year
item.description: Honor has revealed more details of its so-called Robot Phone at MWC 2026, and finally showed a working unit in action alongside a dancing humanoid robot. Specs are still thin on the ground, but the company has confirmed it plans to release the phone in the second half of this year - though I've been […]

item.title: This potentially life-saving breakthrough uses bat-like pulses to turn smartphones into radars to alert users of danger
item.description: ISAC technology allows smartphones to act as radar sensors, detecting hazards, people, and environmental risks across existing 5G networks.

item.title: Pour ses 30 ans, Opera dévoile Web Rewind, le musée des moments qui ont vraiment façonné Internet
item.description: Opera fête 3 décennies de bons et loyaux services et nous propose un voyage dans le temps rempli de nostalgie. Découvrez Web Rewind !

item.title: Dreame X60 Max Ultra Complete Review: $1,700 Worth of Robot Vacuum Problems
item.description: And its app is as cluttered as its name.

item.title: SaaS in, SaaS out: Here’s what’s driving the SaaSpocalypse
item.description: What's behind the SaaSpocalypse? It simply seems a new supreme has risen.

item.title: I was wrong about macOS 26 – its design is far worse than I first thought
item.description: macOS 26’s design is a mess, and its missteps suggest there’s something seriously wrong at Apple.

item.title: Ma prise en main de la tablette la plus fine du monde qui veut détrôner l’iPad Pro
item.description: Dans un marché des tablettes haut de gamme largement dominé par Apple et Samsung, Honor tente une percée audacieuse. La Honor MagicPad 4 n'est pas qu'une simple mise à jour de la MagicPad 2 ou 3, c’est la tablette la plus fine du monde !

item.title: Arsenal vs Chelsea Live Streams: How to watch Premier League 2025-26 from anywhere in the world
item.description: All the ways to watch Arsenal vs Chelsea live streams online and from anywhere, with the table-topping Gunners looking to win another London derby.

item.title: Faudra-t-il payer pour Galaxy AI ? Samsung rassure sans fermer la porte
item.description: Deux hauts représentants de Samsung apportent des clarifications quant à la possibilité de rendre Galaxy AI payant.

item.title: Actor Awards 2026: Your guide to the rebranded SAG-AFTRA event, including where and when to stream it
item.description: The former Screen Actors Guild Awards, presented by the trade union for actors, is arguably Hollywood’s most meaningful celebration of the season. While some parts of the country deal with freezing temperatures and blizzards, Los Angeles sits comfortably in the mid-70s.

item.title: « Une nouvelle espèce de smartphone » : Honor présente son Robot Phone
item.description: Honor profite du salon mondial du mobile pour lancer son « Robot Phone ». La marque le présente comme une « nouvelle catégorie de smartphone motorisé », capable de bouger de manière autonome pour interagir avec son environnement.

item.title: Honor’s Magic V6 doesn’t have a new rabbit to pull out of its hat
item.description: Honor launched the Magic V5 in August 2025 and yet its successor is being announced just seven months later. Speak to Honor’s representatives, and you can imply that it’s racing to push the envelope against both its real competition (Samsung) and its anticipated one (Apple). With so little time between launches, you’ll be unsurprised to learn that little has changed. The only other real reason this device has been pushed out so swiftly is because it’ll help Honor retain the title of making the world’s thinnest foldable. I’ll leave you to decide if you think that’s a valid enough reason to rele...

item.title: Le Honor Magic V6 fait tomber les derniers avantages des smartphones classiques
item.description: Honor vient de lever le voile sur son nouveau smartphone pliant le Magic V6, et la marche chinoise ne plaisante plus.

item.title: Avec ses MagicPad 4 et MagicBook Pro 14, Honor chasse sur les terres d’Apple
item.description: Honor vient de présenter sa nouvelle tablette MagicPad 4 et son nouvel ordinateur portable MagicBook Pro 14. Deux produits haut de gamme qui se positionnent frontalement à ceux d’Apple.

item.title: Resident Evil Requiem leans too much on the series’ past
item.description: Resident Evil turns 30 this year. The series is full of history - the new Resident Evil Requiem is technically the ninth mainline game, but there are a bunch of spinoffs, remakes, movies, and even a TV show - which can make it fun to follow for fans. But it's also intimidating for people like […]

item.title: How MLB can make baseball relevant on a fast-changing internet
item.description: This is The Stepback, a weekly newsletter breaking down one essential story from the tech world. For more on the contemporary attention economy, follow Mia Sato. The Stepback arrives in our subscribers' inboxes at 8AM ET. Opt in for The Stepback here. How it started "KING BASEBALL, monarch of the American sport world, is sick," […]

item.title: Meta won’t let morality get in the way of a product launch
item.description: There's never been a better time to add facial recognition to everything! The public at large is gradually becoming numb to our Palantirized surveillance state, and American communities are responding to the militarization of federal law enforcement with their own increasingly intricate webs of sousveillance. The Ray-Ban Meta glasses are sleek, unobtrusive wearables with front-facing […]...

item.title: Honor’s Magic V6 is the first foldable with an IP69 rating
item.description: For the third year running, Honor has announced what it says is the world's thinnest book-style folding phone. For the second year, it's combined that with the biggest battery in any foldable too. This year, for its third and final trick, the company went ahead and made sure it was the first foldable with an […]

item.title: I tested the slim Honor MagicBook Pro 14 (2026) laptop, and let me tell you, it means serious business with a shockingly long battery life for all-day use
item.description: The latest Honor MagicBook Pro 14 reinforces the premium style and performance of the MagicBook range, with a bright 14.6-inch 3.1K OLED touch screen and a huge 92Wh battery. The latest Intel Core Ultra 5, featuring an integrated Arc GPU, provides a powerful combination that sees this laptop primed for business professionals and creatives.

item.title: 'Makes using fresh coffee beans as simple as pods' — the 3 best coffee makers with grinders, recommended by a barista
item.description: Whatever your budget, there's a bean-to-cup espresso machine that will make brewing with fresh beans as simple as using coffee pods.

item.title: Why are so many AI assistants female by default — and should we be worried about that?
item.description: From Siri to ChatGPT, many AI assistants have defaulted to female voices. Here’s how that happened — and why that choice is important.

item.title: How to share your location via satellite on iPhone
item.description: Apple’s satellite features are designed for situations where cellular and Wi-Fi coverage are unavailable. In supported regions, compatible iPhone 14 or later models can connect directly to a satellite to send messages, access Emergency SOS and share location data. Location sharing via satellite is particularly useful when traveling in remote areas, hiking or driving through regions with limited network coverage. This guide explains what is required to use location sharing via satellite on an iPhone, how to prepare the feature in advance and how to send your location when no signal is available...

item.title: Could robot phones be the next leap in physical AI?
item.description: It’s time to rethink the familiar slab smartphone.

item.title: Le Honor Robot Phone a une caméra de cinéma grâce à ARRI
item.description: HONOR vient d’officialiser un partenariat stratégique avec ARRI, le géant allemand de l’image cinématographique. L’objectif ? Transposer la « science de l’image » des plateaux de tournage hollywoodiens directement dans nos poches.

item.title: Adieu le Galaxy Z Fold ? Pourquoi le Honor Magic V6 pourrait devenir le roi des smartphones pliables
item.description: Voici le Magic V6 de Honor. Cette nouvelle version mise sur une finesse record de 8,75 mm, une résistance accrue et une intégration étonnante avec l'écosystème Apple.

item.title: Honor MagicBook Pro 14 : un écran OLED 3,1K, la puce Intel Core Ultra X9 et 15h d’autonomie annoncés
item.description: C'est l'éternelle bataille du « MacBook Pro Killer ». Cette année, Honor dégaine un MagicBook Pro 14 avec la nouvelle puce Intel Core Ultra X9.

item.title: Plus fine qu’un iPad Pro, la Honor MagicPad 4 est aussi surpuissante et coûte deux fois moins chère
item.description: Honor vient de lever le voile sur sa MagicPad 4, une tablette qui mise tout sur une finesse record de 4,8 mm. Équipée du dernier Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 et d'un écran OLED à 165 Hz, elle vient bousculer le marché premium en 2026.

item.title: Recteq Flagship 1600 Review: An Upgraded Smoker
item.description: The Recteq Flagship 1600 pellet smoker asks a little more of you, but rewards you with deeply smoked flavor.
